mapper.select: /* AuthReaderMapper.selectUserForLogin - 로그인용 사용자 정보 조회 */ SELECT user_id as userId, username, email, password_hash as passwordHash, display_name as displayName, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, is_active as isActive FROM users WHERE (username = #{loginId} OR email = #{loginId}) AND is_active = TRUE

/* AuthReaderMapper.selectUserById - 사용자 ID로 정보 조회 */ SELECT user_id as userId, username, email, password_hash as passwordHash, display_name as displayName, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, is_active as isActive FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_active = TRUE
